title: Art deco cyrillic font?
content:
Hi guys,

I need an art deco font similar to Neutraface ( [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803234745/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface") ) that contains letters from the Cyrillic alphabet.  
Any suggestions?

Thank a lot!
author: jbosch.creative

comments.content: Maybe Hypatia Sans with judicious use of its stylistic sets?
Also perhaps Futura PT, Circe, or Proxima Nova.
